entry.title: New release for Tasks.md: 2.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Source ports and variables from process.env when running it locally (as described in https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/issues/69);
  • Fix bug where deleting a card expands it to the editor view (as described in https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/issues/72).

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/compare/2.0.0...2.1.0

entry.title: New release for Tasks.md: 2.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Improve design for mobile devices by @DanielPantle in https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/pull/77
  • Only apply snap on limited accuracy devices (mostly touch screen devices);
  • Fix line break for tasks and lanes with long names;
  • Save editor mode preference (markdown or rich text);
  • Add fullscreen for task expanded view;
  • Prevent showing files that are not markdown in the board.

New Contributors

  • @DanielPantle made their first contribution in https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/pull/77

Full Changelog: https://github.com/BaldissaraMatheus/Tasks.md/compare/2.1.0...2.2.0
